definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
to crowd in/to cram in/to force others aside/to press/to squeeze/to find (time in one's busy schedule)

sentences.english: Prolonged pressure caused the sternum to snap in half and the ribs to break.
sentences.chinese: 大型瓦斯罐由於受到爆震波的壓擠破裂倒塌了。

sentences.english: In the process of this squashing, some energy is lost.
sentences.chinese: 在這個壓擠的過程中，有一部分能量喪失了。

sentences.english: Do not jam the packing by excessive gland loading.
sentences.chinese: 切勿使用過大的壓蓋載荷來壓擠盤根。

sentences.english: I would be ground down between the Congress and the increasingly assertive bureaucracy.
sentences.chinese: 我將被國會和日益武斷的官僚機構壓擠得透不過氣來。

sentences.english: To Pat or squeeze fondly or playfully, especially under the chin.
sentences.chinese: 天真或頑皮地輕拍或壓擠，特指拍下巴。

sentences.english: Lava was ejected from the volcano.
sentences.chinese: 熔岩受到壓擠而從火山口噴射出來。
